item.title: Need help with Dragon Claws.[Pics]
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

Ok, I’m using Garboscapes source and SpliceScape client and I added models for Dclaws from PwnScape3’s client and they added fine, now heres the problem, I put in Berkys Dragon Claws inv model
(found here: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369541.0.html) that added fine, now I added the special from PwnScape3 and heres the code

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

Now heres the compiling error:

Then I change it to this…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); getHit(8); }
And there’s no error, now when I’m ingame here is what happens.

And bonuses don’t show up.

I don’t get this, I’ve done this 1000 time before, and now it doesn’t work?
Add me on MSN if you need to
pure69m0nk@hotmail.com

Read full topic
